article_title: US restricts travel for diplomats in Israel
sentence: The  October  attack  saw  gunmen  kill  1,200  people  and  take  more  than  250  hostage  after  crossing  into  Israel  from  Gaza.

article_title: US restricts travel for diplomats in Israel
sentence: Israel  says  that  of  130  hostages  still  in  Gaza,  at  least  34  are  dead.

article_title: US restricts travel for diplomats in Israel
sentence: More  than  33,000  Gazans,  the  majority  of  them  civilians,  have  been  killed  during  Israel's  subsequent  offensive  in  Gaza,  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says.
